'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 768 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Situated in a lush landscape of old growth trees and charming ponds and featuring open layouts, first-rate amenities and close proximity to Cherry Creek, Cedar Run gives you a stylish place to call home while granting you easy access to everything the city has to offer.', 'Our one and two bedroom apartments feature expansive floor plans with spacious bedrooms, modern decorator kitchens, private patios and balconies and walk-in closets.', "Cedar Run's amenities were designed for an active lifestyle.", 'Inside, you’ll enjoy a state-of-the-art fitness center, heated indoor pool, basketball courts and racquetball courts.', 'Outside, you’ll find two refreshing swimming pools, walking and jogging trails, and a sand volleyball court for fun in the fresh air and sunshine.', 'An incredible Cherry Creek location puts you exactly where you want to be.', 'Luxury apartments near Cherry Creek Mall open a whole host of excellent shopping, dining, and entertainment destinations just around the corner, and with easy access to interstates I-70 and I-225, work, school, and play are always just minutes away from our apartments in
